name: Last L!fe: Attack: SE Fahrenheit City
name_original: Last L!fe: Attack: SE Fahrenheit City
description:
Last L!fe Attack! Southeast Fahrenheit City

A man named Emmet is about to raid the Southeast region of Fahrenheit City. But his helicopter crashed and it alerted the enemy soldiers. Now Emmet must escape the region to live.

WASD Movement

Right Click to Shoot

Move Cursor to Aim

Enter to Restart

Space Bar to Start
